text: Habib the Carpenter was a martyr in Antioch.Hughes Dictionary of Islam, Habib the Carpenter According to Muslim tradition, Habib believed the message of the disciples of Jesus and died for his faith.Muhammad, Martin Lings, Page. 113 His tomb is located in the Habib-i Neckar Mosque.Hughes Dictionary of Islam, Habib the Carpenter: "Habib's tomb is still seen in Antioch, and is visited by Muhammadans as a shrine."The Mosque of Habib-i Neccar (Habib al-Najj√¢r) ==References== Category:5 births
title: Habib the Carpenter
